item.title: My profile website is now a terminal
item.description: When I was younger I used to think that my profile website would be a really cool, fully featured website, with shiny colors and animations; built with the latest cutting edge frontend technology… Turns out that the older I get the more I prefer a simple terminal. No UI, just text and commands. The last time I updated my profile website, it looked like this: It was already pretty minimalistic, right?
